rate_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the maximum allowed requests. Please try again later after 24 hours.

user_banned: User @{requester} is banned and is not allowed to update data of @{username}.
not_authorized: You are not authorized to update user data of @{username}.
action_not_authorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
post_rate_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the maximum allowed posts. Please try again later after 24 hours.

error_while_deleting_hashtag: An error occurred while deleting the hashtag and related posts and comments:
invalid_link_try_again: Sorry, the link you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.
username_maxLength: Username must be less than {length} characters.
username_minLength: Username must be longer than {length} characters.
username_pattern: Username must contain only English letters, numbers, and underscores (_).
full_name_maxLength: Full name must be less than {length} characters.
full_name_minLength: Full name must be longer than {length} characters.
email_maxLength: Email must be less than {length} characters.
password_maxLength: Password must be less than {length} characters.
password_minLength: Password must be longer than {length} characters.
active_allowedValues: User activation status must be either inactive (false) or active (true).
is_banned_allowedValues: Membership ban status must be either (false) or (true).
role_allowedValues: User role must be one of the following values: "admin", "moderator", "user".
birthdate_dateformat: Birthdate must be in the correct format like "YYYY-MM-DD".
gender_allowedValues: User gender must be either "male" or "female".
location_maxLength: User location must be less than {length} characters.
location_minLength: User location must be longer than {length} characters.
bio_maxLength: Bio must be less than {length} characters.
phone_maxLength: Phone number must be less than {length} digits.
profile_picture_type: Profile picture must be of type BLOB (Buffer).
post_title_maxLength: Post title is too long. It must not exceed {length} characters.
post_title_minLength: Post title is too short. It must be at least {length} characters.
post_id_maxLength: Post ID is too long. It must not exceed {length} characters.
post_id_minLength: Post ID is too short. It must be at least {length} characters.

post_content_minLength: Post content is too short. It must be at least {length} characters.

comment_content_minLength: Comment content is too short. It must be at least {length} characters.

like_id_too_long: Like ID must not exceed {length} characters.

report_id_minLength: Report ID is too short. It must be at least {length} characters.
report_type_allowedValues: Report category must be either "abuse", "harassment", "spam", "hate speech", "violence", "copyright infringement", "inappropriate content", or "other".
